name: RunTestOnSofy
description: Add a pipeline task to test your application on Sofy.ai

inputs.name: api_key
inputs.label: Please enter the API key associated with your account
inputs.helpMarkDown: Please enter your Sofy.ai API Key. To generate new key login to your account at https://sofy.ai and hit regenerate key in account => settings => API Key
